title: Work study practical exercise film. No. 12
brief_description: An analysis of poultry feeding and egg collection designed to help work study lecturers; each operation requiring special study skills and techniques. The first part is a complete record of the original methods filmed as would be seen by a work study engineer. The film is stopped and students carry out their studies. Then the second part of the film shows the actions installed is projected. Part of the “Work Study Case Histories - No 2”.
